thread.title: David Beckham shocks fans with ugly scarred face and yellow teeth in first photo from King Arthur cameo
thread.title_full: David Beckham shocks fans with ugly scarred face and yellow teeth in first photo from King Arthur cameo

author: Lara Martin
title: David Beckham shocks fans with ugly scarred face and yellow teeth in first photo from King Arthur cameo
text:
David Beckham shocks fans with ugly scarred face and yellow teeth in first photo from King Arthur cameo The footballer looks VERY different in his latest Instagram   Get   
David Beckham is often hailed as one of the world’s most handsome men… but fans had a rather nasty shock today when he appeared looking, well, incredibly ugly. 
The former footballer stunned fans by uploading a photo to Instagram showing him looking a million miles from his usual dapper, smart self, showing off a badly scarred face, balding head and yellow teeth seriously in need of a brush. 
Fans were, understandably, shocked by the grizzly snap, wondering what on earth had happened to their good looking Becks?! 
One wrote: “Noooo. What happened to your face?” 
Another said: “Oh dear! Make sure you floss every day as those teeth aren't a great look.” 
A third added: “OMG!! This is terrible.” Is that really you, Becks? (Photo: Instagram/davidbeckham) Beckham as we know and love him (Photo: Visual China Group) 
Although not everyone was entirely turned off. Quite a few simply remarked, “still would”, while others reckoned Becks would be gorgeous no matter what he looked like. 
Those that read the caption would know the picture was taken on the set of Guy Ritchie’s upcoming King Arthur movie, where Beckham has a cameo as a grumpy knight. 
He confirmed the role in an interview with The Times in 2015, saying: “I had 13 lines and practised a huge amount beforehand. Guy had someone come and rehearse with me, and I did that an hour every day in the build-up.” 
Becks added that filming had been "nerve wracking" but he'd enjoyed it. Beckham enjoyed filming his role (Photo: Getty) Beckham with Ritche and Tom Cruise (Photo: Facebook/David Beckham) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
